Package nz.ac.auckland.morc

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    MorcMethods  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AnonymousMorc
    Hack to work with JUnit (sigh)
    morc
    A convenience class that helps to quickly instantiate test cases using a scripting tool like Groovy.
    MorcBuilder<Builder extends MorcBuilder<Builder>>
    The root builder for specifying processors and predicates for message publishers and mock definitions
    MorcMethods.HeaderValue  
    MorcMethods.JsonRuntimeTestResource  
    MorcMethods.NS  
    MorcMethods.VariablePair  
    MorcMethods.XmlRuntimeTestResource  
    MorcParameterized
    A heavily modified version of JUnit's Parameterized class that assumes there's a public static void configure() method available to configure a set of test specifications which will then be retrieved using the getSpecifications method of MorcTest Any copyright for similar code will be under the EPL license for JUnit
    MorcTest
    This carries out the actual testing of the orchestrated specification specification - ensuring ordering of the received exchanges is as expected This will be extended for actual tests and will use JUnit Parameterized to add parameters at runtime.
    MorcTestBuilder  
    TestBean
    Rather than sending to a Camel endpoint it is possible to run arbitrary Java code for special cases
